name: TECHNICAL POLO SHIRT
description: Relaxed-fit shirt made of technical fabric. Featuring a collar with front opening and short sleeves.

name: SEERSUCKER PRINTED SHIRT
description: Relaxed fit shirt. Spread collar and short sleeves. Split hem. Button-up front.

name: TEXTURED KNIT T-SHIRT
description: Knit T-shirt made of spun textured chenille fabric. Round neck and short sleeves. Ribbed trims.

name: COTTON - LINEN TROUSERS
description: Trousers made of a cotton and 28% linen blend. Elasticated waistband with adjustable drawstring. Front pockets and back welt pockets.

name: QUARTER-ZIP SWEATSHIRT
description: Long sleeve quarter-zip sweatshirt. Ribbed trims.

name: PLEATED BERMUDA SHORTS WITH BELT
description: Regular fit Bermuda shorts. Waist with belt and front pleated details. Front pockets and back welt pockets. Front zip fly and button fastening.
